accessibility_support_other: This training can be customized according to your accessibility needs. Some adjustments may induce additional costs as they are provided by third-party providers.
comments: On-site teaching sessions can be scheduled upon request.
description: This training course provides necessary knowledge to ensure that digital accessibility is considered through all steps of a project. This goes from the initial project requirements to the project closing. At the end of the training, participants will be able to manage and follow accessibility processes on their own.
english_title: Include digital accessibility in a web or mobile project
title: Intégrer l'accessibilité numérique dans la gestion de projet web ou mobile
topics: People with disabilities, user needs and assistive technologies
Implementing accessibility in a project: requirements, usual barriers against accessibility implementation
Key factors to implement accessibility in a project successfully
